title: 820-01700 no image
message:
No image on internal or external
Dont have new internal display to test with
Target mode gives me "disk is not readable"
DFU restore and revive went through but no change to image
Touchbar doesnt work

Board is carefully inspected, GPU dye itself too
No idea where to start on this one, never had no image on a 16" before

Edit: it seems to "boot", it chimes and gives usb activity

title: 820-01700 no image
message:
Any history available?
Did you test external video disconnecting internal LCD?

title: 820-01700 no image
message:
No history, customer tells us it just stopped working

Yes internal is disconnected when we try external, we have now also tried replacing display with a used original known-working one as well

Edit: it was bought aprox. a year ago

title: 820-01700 no image
message:
Looks like GPU problem; check if it gets all voltages.
You can try changing U9850; it normally affects only internal video.
Just in case, check diode mode to ground on EDP_INT lines, corresponding to J8500.

title: 820-01700 no image
message:
Ive checked voltages and they seem fine.

UA600:
VIN=12.9v
VCC=5v

UA000
PP1V8_S0_GPU=1.8v
PP3V3_S0_GPU=3.3v

I noticed the area to the left of GPU is getting up to 50c hot, while GPU is lukewarm in comparison
[ATTACH type="full"]60594[/ATTACH]

title: 820-01700 no image
message: 0.7V on all 4 coils in that space

title: 820-01700 no image
message:
Nothing strange there.

Missing internal/external video at same time, points more to internal GPU problem.
